item.title: Krishan Bhatia, Who Helped Amazon Build Presence in TV Upfronts, is Exiting
item.description: Krishan Bhatia, who joined Amazon last year to help build its presence on Madison Avenue and in the industry’s annual “upfront” sales market, is leaving the streaming and e-commerce
